message:
Greetings!

Thank you for taking the time in submitting a proposal to speak at {{ doc.event_name}}.

It was a difficult selection process and if possible we would love to host them all, but unfortunately, your talk was not among the ones which made it into the final selection.

Login to the proposal page to view the comments from reviewers.

Keep up the good effort. We hope you will submit proposals for the next meetup as well, while we shall also reach out to you for future meetups.

We still look forward to having you at the meetup to attend talks, network, and share your ideas.

Do reply to this email in case of any queries or reach out on Telegram.

Thank you once again.


Best Regards,

The FOSS United Bangalore Team
name: CFP Rejection Mail
subject: {{ doc.event_name }} - Update on your proposal
